name: According To My Design
Lore: 'From his throne room aboard the second Death Star, Emperor Palpatine monitors activity throughout the galaxy.',
Text: 'LOST: Use 3 Force to deploy Emperor from Reserve Deck; reshufle.STARTING: Unless your 1st marker, Death Star, starship, or starship site on table, deploy from Reserve Deck Emperor to your site (even if converted), and deploy from Reserve Deck up to three Effects that deploy on table for free and are [Immune to Alter].  Light side goes first.  Place Interrupt in Lost Pile.',
